title: BimlFlex App Definition for Columns
description: The BimlFlex Column concept contains the components of an Column. Columns define the detailed information to transform and map data from source to target.Columns within BimlFlex are displayed in a hierarchical tree view on the left side navigation menu. The total number of Columns within a Project will be displayed next to the Project name in parentheses. The total number of Columns within an individual Object will similarly be displayed next to the Object name.Selecting a Project will display a secondary list of all Columns within, organized by Object.

frontMatter.title: BimlFlex App Definition for Columns
frontMatter.summary: Documentation of functionality within BimlFlex for Columns
